<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>

<color=orange>DEEP PROJECT</color> SCHEMATICS
2
1
Yet to be done: Disengage mask within <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> paired to personal memory statue (after delivering <color=orange>parting staff</color> to Cassava to unpair his statue) once project is ready.
3 2
Modifications will be made to allow more than one individual to pair to this particular memory statue. Upon activation of Deep Storm Station, statue will be triggered again to pair with Cassava, upon detecting failure.
4
3
The system will be <color=orange>unable to connect individuals</color> to the Deep Project during interference from external memory recording, such as <color=orange>a separate memory statue paired to the user.</color>
5
4
Of note: once unpaired, to maintain connection to the separate system of the Deep Project, user will <color=orange>no longer receive memories from Ash Twin Project memory storage system</color> - and be <color=orange>unable to voyage</color> until reconnected.
